SEARCH
Package com.example.cab302project.controllers

Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302project.controllers.SettingsController
public class SettingsController extends Object
Controller for the Settings view of the application. Allows users to edit account information, upload a profile image, sync Google Calendar, update bio, and navigate to other pages. Renders the sidebar, mini day view, and shows motivational quotes.

      public SettingsController()

  • Method Details

    • cropAndResizeImage

      private javafx.scene.image.Image cropAndResizeImage(javafx.scene.image.Image input, int width, int height)
      Crops and resizes a JavaFX Image to a square of the specified width and height. Center-crops the image, then scales to the target size.
      Parameters:
      input - The original JavaFX Image.
      width - The target width (pixels).
      height - The target height (pixels).
      Returns:
      Cropped and resized JavaFX Image.

    • imageToByteArray

      private byte[] imageToByteArray(javafx.scene.image.Image image) throws IOException
      Converts a JavaFX Image to a PNG byte array for database storage.
      Parameters:
      image - JavaFX Image to convert.
      Returns:
      Byte array representing the PNG-encoded image.
      Throws:
      IOException - if encoding fails.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the settings view after FXML loading. Loads logo, sidebar, user info, profile image, bio, date, quote, and sets up sidebar.

    • updateDateLabel

      private void updateDateLabel()
      Updates the sidebar's date label to the current date.

    • renderMiniDayView

      private void renderMiniDayView()
      Renders a mini day calendar view (24 hourly slots) in the sidebar.

    • onLogoHover

      private void onLogoHover()
      Enlarges the logo when hovered for UI feedback.

    • onLogoExit

      private void onLogoExit()
      Resets the logo to its original size when mouse exits.

    • handleUploadGoogleCalendar

      private void handleUploadGoogleCalendar()
      Handles uploading a Google Calendar (.ics) file. Clears existing user events, prompts user to select file, imports events, and updates status label.

    • handleUploadImage

      private void handleUploadImage()
      Handles the upload of a new profile image. Allows user to choose image, crops and resizes, updates image in UI and DB.

    • handleChangeEmail

      private void handleChangeEmail()
      Handles changing the user's email address. Validates input, updates in database, updates session, and shows a status alert.

    • handleChangePassword

      private void handleChangePassword()
      Handles changing the user's password. Validates minimum length, updates in database, updates session, and shows status alert.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String message)
      Displays a standard JavaFX alert dialog.
      Parameters:
      alertType - Alert type (information, warning, error, etc).
      title - Title text for the dialog.
      message - Main content/message.

    • setRandomQuote

      private void setRandomQuote()
      Sets a random motivational or themed quote in the sidebar.

    • goToHome

      private void goToHome()
      Navigates to the calendar (home) page, replacing the current scene.

    • handleLogOut

      private void handleLogOut()
      Handles logout: clears session and returns to login screen.

    • openFriendsPage

      private void openFriendsPage()
      Navigates to the friends page, replacing the current scene.

    • openProfilePage

      private void openProfilePage()
      Navigates to the profile page, replacing the current scene.

    • handleEditBio

      private void handleEditBio()
      Handles editing the user's bio. Saves the current text to DB (up to 100 words).
